message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $90. How about we meet in the middle of our previous offer and your offer?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $100?
I'm getting closer to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $100. How about we try $105?
